summary: This code is a "pyproject.toml" configuration file for a Python project named "open-qstar". It specifies the version, dependencies and build system requirements.

details.comment: This code is a "pyproject.toml" configuration file for a Python project named "open-qstar". It specifies the version, dependencies and build system requirements.
details.content:
[tool.poetry]
name = "open-qstar"
version = "0.1.0"
description = ""
authors = ["estill01 <ehs.stillman@gmail.com>"]
readme = "README.md"
packages = [{include = "open_qstar"}]
[tool.poetry.dependencies]
python = "^3.10"
torch = "^2.1.1"
transformers = "^4.35.2"
loguru = "^0.7.2"
redis = "^5.0.1"
sqlalchemy = "^2.0.23"
[build-system]
requires = ["poetry-core"]
build-backend = "poetry.core.masonry.api"
